value:
There is no sight more brilliant than
a beaming bride on her wedding day.
If only I had one of my own...

Those who blindly follow scripture
and ignore their hearts are puppets.
The true gift from above is free will.

A wedding is a turning point in the
life of a couple. A joyous event, after
which they will be joined as one.

Ah, hello! If I might inquire... Do you
have a sister I might introduce myself
to, $Nu?

The Heroes truly are a dizzying array
of beauties. It's enough to convince
one that good looks are required!

Should you need anyone to observe
a wedding, you may call on me, Saul,
at $Nf's castle.

O blessed Saint Elimine, watch over
me as I train to spread word of your
glory to all the women of this world!

Come, one and all! Pledge yourself to
Saint Elimine and all of your problems
will instantly be solved!$k$p...That's a little joke.

Ugh. If this keeps up, the scolding
I'll get from Bishop Yoder will be
even harsher than usual.

Praises be! I will use this blessing
to protect your flock. The women
will be given priority, of course...

I am Saul, priest in service of Saint
Elimine, here to witness the festivities
and perform services as necessary.

Every time I witness two lovers being
joined in matrimony, I am struck by
how blessed I am to be a priest.$k$pUnder ordinary circumstances, my
primary focus is helping women to
the altar, but...another time, perhaps.$k$pI wish those who make pledges to
love one another only the utmost
happiness—as does Saint Elimine.$k$pSeeing happy couples off on their
honeymoons over and again can
make one feel a bit...lonely.$k$pWould it be too much trouble for
Saint Elimine, blessed be her name,
to find me a beautiful wife of faith?$k$pAh, but for now, let us celebrate the
love here before us! Shall we join in,
$Nu? Praises be!
はいっ
おっと
ぐっ…
How inelegant...
A benediction.
On this beautiful day...
I'll have your vow.
Peace everlasting.
Overstepped...
Sigh
A blessing to you.
Congratulations!
Ah, a couple in love, bound together by a holy vow. It is a magnificent thing.
Me? My love is for the people. Chiefly the women, I'll admit.
Beautiful women, dressed in their finest, as far as the eye can see... Is this heaven itself?
I must take this opportunity to spread the word of St. Elimine. To not do so would be a waste.
I would be happy to preside over your wedding as well. I will devote myself to the task wholeheartedly.
Is that so?
Come again?
Oh, indeed.
